name: The Florist (eightbitskyline)
description:
Your grandmother has instructed you to take care of her apartment and a lot of house plants for the next three weeks. Keep the plants healthy or let them die while you read some classic short stories by writers like Kielland, Hemingway and Kafka!

The Florist is a game made for #AdvJam21. It is developed in Unity for Windows PC & Mac.

Controls:

  • Left click: Interact
  • ESC: Open menu
  • Access inventory by moving the cursor to the top of the screen

Tutorial:

  • Open the door every day to receive new mail.
  • Use the fertilizer, watering can and spray bottle with care.
  • Access the Plantopedia wiki on the computer for help.
  • Click on the clock to progress time.
